body.name: litokam 5MP Security Camera Outdoor, 5G/2.4G WiFi Home Security Camera Outside with Color Night Vision, 360° PTZ Wireless Camera with AI Motion Detection & 2-Way Talk, Support Onvif/NVR/Alexa
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 59 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 29 mins
features: 【5MP Surper HD & Full Color Night Vision】Litokam outdoor camera with 5MP HD resolution provides you a clear and vivid image quality and captures more details on your home anywhere during day and night by using 3X digital Zoom. This wireless cameras for home security outdoor built-in 12 bright floodlights, once motion is detected, the floodlights will be triggered. You can view clear full-color night vision in the dark.

【5Ghz/2.4GHz Dual WiFi Bands】This outdoor security camera is suitable for the 2.4GHz and 5GHz, offers faster and more freedom in choosing Wi-Fi connections. 5G can deliver stronger signals, and you can also switch to 2.4GHz for remote transmission. Support for NVR and Onvif.

【AI Motion Detection, 360° Pan/Tilt】By artificial intelligence algorithm, the wifi camera outside can distinguish between human and other objects and send you real-time motion/sound-triggered notifications. Designed with a rotation of 355° horizontally and 100° vertically, allowing you to control the security camera on your phone. You can set the auto motion tracking area in the app (Corded wireless security camera outdoor, not a battery camera)

【Two-Way Audio & Multi-Sharing】Built-in microphone and speaker, litokam security camera can establish a real-time conversation between you and your visitors. It also supports multiple people watching at the same time. You can share it with your family for good moments. Every outside cameras for home security ensures your security data to keep private.

【Flexible Storage & Works with Alexa】You can save videos to a max 128GB TF card ( Not included ) or cloud storage (14 days free trial) to make sure you can playback the video records at any time. Litokam camera allows linking Alexa Echo Show, you can request to display a live video of the camera through voice control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So impressed, I bought another!
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old Amcrest finally gave up on me so I ordered a Litokam indoor camera to replace it. I was so impressed with the Littlelf software flexibility and the performance and ease of setup of the Litokam that a few days later, I purchased an exterior M1 Litokam. Even though I already have a DVR with a fixed 5 camera system, it's false alerts and lack of PTZ left a lot to be desired. I think 3 of these cameras would far exceed the performance of my far more expensive fixed camera DVR system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera was super easy to setup and configure. It also works great and is easy to move around. Now we can see the whole front yard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this camera
reviews.reviewText: This security camera is a real security powerhouse! Super clear footage day and night with full-color night vision keeps me feeling safe. The spotlight and siren deter unwanted visitors, though I haven't had to use the siren yet.The two-way audio lets me chat with delivery guys or scare off critters, which I have used before. It's weatherproof which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture for great price
reviews.reviewText: I liked this cameras very easy to install and picture quality is really good not to mention the night vision. I also order two for out door and they work just as great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cameras work great. I’ve gone back and purchased additional cameras multiple times

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Camera has great resolution and connected fast to my wifi network. App works flawlessly, better than my ring camera and app. Strongly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera, easy setup
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to connect to my WiFi and to mount. The app really makes it easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright spotlight, very easy setup in Tuya Smart App, works with Alexa
reviews.reviewText: I already use a whole bunch of Tuya Smart devices, mostly smart plugs. The idea of getting another camera that worked with the Tuya Smart app I already have on every phone/tablet was exciting!Setup was shockingly easy.I plugged in the only cable from the camera, USB power. There are no audio or network connections at all, or visible wifi antenna.The camera started beeping slowly, and blinking a light.I went into Tuya Smart app, and select add device, Camera, WiFi Camera.It confirmed the camera is ready, then provided a QR code to "show" to the camera.The camera immediately responded, and a couple seconds later it was working, WOW!It also works with Alexa. On an Echo Show I can say "Alexa Show Side View", and it shows the camera I named "Side View".One very annoying flaw is there is no Tuya Smart app for Windows, so I have to use my phone to view the video unless I use an Android emulator for Windows (slow).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comprehensive full featured indoor security camera
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The initial setup is nice and easy, which surprised me actually. Time has moved on a lot! This camera is fully functional, even without subscribing to cloud services.Apart from being available to look through on demand via the internet, this camera will send out alerts when it detects motion and or sound. Each of those two functions can be independently controlled in the scheduling system. For me, I wanted both sound and motion alerts to be sent to my phone after working hours when the workshop is closed. The time scheduler on this is simple enough, select the days you want (Mon, Tues, Wed, etc) I clicked all of them. Then select a time to start from. Set a second schedule to switch off the detection settings. So if you want the motion detection settings on over the weekends, just leave Saturday and Sunday off the 'switching-off' schedule.It is important to take the time to set up the schedules if motion and sound detection are to be used successfully. There is also a detection sensitivity setting. It does send notifications as soon as the detection happens, so if it's set up incorrectly and motion detection is left on all day, it will ping messages all day!The camera has some advanced functions too, like motion tracking where it literally turns to look at whatever is moving. It can also be set for Human Detection, Siren trigger, siren duration, and volume. There are a few more tricks, but that's more than enough for my needs.I'm impressed. I like it. Five Full Stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very useful purchase (I use it for my dog)
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my dog, it’s quite good, I can control the view through an app, it has motion tracking and sound tracking and various other types. It has SD card support and you can make it alert you. Good night vision too. Overall, very useful and happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy indoor home surveillance on a budget.
reviews.reviewText: Really good budget camera with mobile app for keeping check on your property when out and about.Set up is as easy as plugging it in, downloading an app, entering a few settings in the app and you’re ready to go.Image quality is good, not crystal clear at night by any standards but it’s more than I expected from it.You have a couple of storage options, probably the most useful one would be cloud storage as the video files are stored online and therefore aren’t lost in the event of theft. Secondly you can opt for SD storage; useful in some situations but as this is a CCTV/Wi-Fi camera, it’s easy enough for a thief to take it.The app does allow for notifications to be sent to your phone if movement is detected but these can be turned off if you don’t want them.Connects to my VM router without issue as it has 2.4Ghz connectivity.Just for the curious out there, this is a PTZ camera so can be tilted, panned and zoomed(digital)The product description leaves you completely in the dark on this camera and all its specs so it was a bit of a pleasant surprise when it all worked fine, is a decent quality camera and has so many features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great camera for basic home security or checking on pets, that sort of thing.It's powered via a USB C cable, it doesn't have a battery so it won't run out of charge. Control is via the Littlelf Smart app (there's a QR code in the box) and allows you to watch live, and as its a PTZ camera you can move the view to see more of where you are monitoring. It has infrared leads too, so you can see in the dark.One cool feature is the follow function which detects movement and then keeps the target in view. It works OK, but only slow moving large objects, it didn't detect my cat at all. It has 2 way audio, so if you saw your pet doing something they shouldn't you can tell them the stop it.For the price, it's a pretty decent camera, just don't expect it to be a professional grade security device
